headline: Along With $100 Billion U.S. Manufacturing Commitment, Apple's Tim Cook Gifted Trump A Glass 'Made In USA' Plaque On 24-Karat Gold
summary: Apple (NASDAQ:AAPL) CEO Tim Cook earned the title of "tech’s Trump whisperer" in the president’s first term, and he just may have shown why. Cook gifted President Donald Trump a glass plaque with a 24-karat gold base on Aug. 6. The move came as he announced at the White House that Apple would invest $100 billion in the U.S. over the next four years, adding to the $500 billion the company had announced in February. The plaque was engraved with Trump’s name, a reference to Apple's U.S. manufacturi
